results.title: The Effect of Sodium Tanshinone IIA Sulfate and Simvastatin on Elevated Serum Levels of Inflammatory Markers in Patients with Coronary Heart Disease: A Study Protocol for a Randomized Controlled Trial
results.text_hl: In addition, we also aim to assess the integrative therapy's safety and its efficacy in improving @DISEASE_Angina_Pectoris @DISEASE_MESH:D000787 @@@angina@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Postthrombotic_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054070 @@@BSS@@@ symptoms relative to the @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ regimen without @GENE_STS @GENE_412 @@@STS@@@.

citations.NLM: Shang Q, Wang H, Li S, Xu H. results.title: UPLC-QTOF/MS-based metabolomics analysis of plasma reveals an effect of Xue-Fu-Zhu-Yu capsules on blood-stasis syndrome in CHD rats.
results.text_hl: ETHNOPHARMACOLOGICAL RELEVANCE: @<m>DISEASE_Postthrombotic_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054070 @@@Blood-stasis syndrome@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Postthrombotic_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054070 @@@BSS@@@) is a specific ZHENG type of @DISEASE_Coronary_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D003327 @@@coronary heart disease@@@ (@DISEASE_Coronary_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D003327 @@@CHD@@@) in traditional Chinese medicine (TCM).

citations.NLM: Zhao Y, Nie S, Yi M, Wu N, Wang W, Zhang Z, Yao Y, Wang D. UPLC-QTOF/MS-based metabolomics analysis of plasma reveals an effect of Xue-Fu-Zhu-Yu capsules on blood-stasis syndrome in CHD rats. J Ethnopharmacol. 2019 Sep 15;241():111908. PMID: 31029757

results.title: Effect of Chinese drugs for activating blood circulation and detoxifying on indices of thrombosis, inflammatory reaction, and tissue damage in a rabbit model of toxin-heat and blood stasis syndrome.
results.text_hl: METHODS: Fifty-four @SPECIES_9986 @@@rabbits@@@ were randomized into the normal control group, model group, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ group (@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, 0.93 mg/kg per day), ABC group [Xiongshao Capsule, 0.07 g/kg per day], and ABCD group [Xiongshao Capsule, 0.07 g/kg per day, and Huanglian Capsule, 0.14 g/kg per day].

citations.NLM: Xue M, Yin HJ, Wu CF, Ma XJ, Guo CY, Huang Y, Shi DZ, Chen KJ. Effect of Chinese drugs for activating blood circulation and detoxifying on indices of thrombosis, inflammatory reaction, and tissue damage in a rabbit model of toxin-heat and blood stasis syndrome. Chin J Integr Med. 2013 Jan;19(1):42-7. PMID: 22160946
